item.title: Yo Yo YO
item.description: So hiromi is curating an art show that opens tonight. check it out:Plastic FantasticMay 2-18, 2003Opening Reception May 2, 7:00-10:00 p.m1926 Exhibition Studies Space1926 North Halsted, Chicago, il 60614Did you guys know that yesterday was Loyalty Day. I didn’t. I did know, however, that our president rules. He is so so smart. here is some exciting new if you are a racist. Remember in the gravediggaz album where RZA gnaws his own arm off?
